title: @L4T3NCY,For sanity's sake, can we have the next URF on Crystal Scar?
body:
Before you downvote me because "lol dominions shit xD" just hear me out.

-Crystal Scar has much lower death timers than Summoner's Rift. 
-There are no structures or bases. This means Malzahar cannot be in your base taking your inhibitor at 6-7 minutes. 
-Even more increased passive gold generation, so even if Eve/Shaco/Zed get through, you won't be completely starved
-You can just freely duke it out on an open map without worrying about towers
-You start at level 3, not level 1. Some champions have too much of an oppressive level 1 in URF, being able to have all basic abilities right off the bat helps level the playing field somewhat.


I think it'd be worth a shot to see how it fares out, to perhaps make URF a bit less snowbally and remove the restrictive feel the game mode has being on The Rift. I just want to get 6 items and fight, not have to constantly have to base past 8 minutes because no one is dealing with Malzahar and lose before I even have a chance to get full build going.
